title: What song first comes to mind when hearing the word 'whiskey'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two songs: ** “Alabama Song” by the Doors ** “There's Whiskey in the Jar” by Thin Lizzy Regarding the Alabama Song: This amazing song is not written and composed by the members of the Doors. The words are written by Berthold Brecht (1898-1956). The music is composed by Kurt Weil (1900-1950). Brecht was born in Germany and his first language was German. His secretary was also his translator when he had to write something in English. Her name is Elisabeth Hauptmann (1897-1973).

The first song that comes to mind when I hear whiskey is Amy Winehouse’s REHAB  Once during the Bestival festival on the Isle of Wight The late singer ordered 48 bottles of Jack Daniels ! Upon hearing this festival promoters quickly devised a contingency plan, just in case!
